definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: To shorten the time, the rapid thermal burn cooking pot is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 若想缩短时间，断热烹调的焖烧锅值得推荐。

sentences.english: The saucepan may be full of hot water .
sentences.chinese: 烧锅里可能装满滚烫的热水。

sentences.english: It is both economic and convenient to cook rice with this stew-pot.
sentences.chinese: 用这种焖烧锅做饭，既省电又方便。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
strainer (made of bamboo, wicker, or wire)
to cook in a small quantity of water
to light a fire for cooking
to stir-fry/to do the cooking/stir-fried dish
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head
